## OperationStatus enum

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Enumeration defining potential states of an operation

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum OperationStatus 
```

## Enumeration Members

<table><thead><tr><th>

Member


</th><th>

Value


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

Aborted


</td><td>

`"ABORTED"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The operation was aborted


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

Blocked


</td><td>

`"BLOCKED"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The Operation could not be executed because one or more of its dependencies failed


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

Executing


</td><td>

`"EXECUTING"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The Operation is currently executing


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

Failure


</td><td>

`"FAILURE"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The Operation failed


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

NoOp


</td><td>

`"NO OP"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The operation performed no meaningful work.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

Ready


</td><td>

`"READY"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The Operation is on the queue, ready to execute


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

Success


</td><td>

`"SUCCESS"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The Operation completed successfully and did not write to standard output


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

Waiting


</td><td>

`"WAITING"`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The Operation is on the queue, waiting for one or more depencies


</td></tr>
